content.text: I'm doing well, thanks for asking! How about yourself?
I'm doing great, thanks! I'm headed to University of Michigan in the fall, so I'm a little nervous but excited.
That's awesome! What are you studying?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm thinking about majoring in music.
That's great! I've always been passionate about music, but I never had the opportunity to pursue it.
I'm glad I'm not the only one who loves music!
Me too! It's a great way to express yourself.
I know, right? It's my favorite way to relax.
What's your favorite band or artist?
I love a lot of different bands, but my favorite is probably The Beatles.
The Beatles are great! I love their music.
I agree! They're one of the best bands of all time.
I think so too! They've had a huge influence on music.
Definitely! They're one of the reasons I love music so much.
Me too! I'm glad we're both music lovers.
